product_name: REI Recycled Fleece Grip Gloves - Women's
long_description: The women's REI Recycled Fleece Grip gloves keep your hands warm while you walk the dog, take a hike or head to work in the morning. Midweight fleece contains at least 50% recycled polyester fibers; fabric dries quickly and insulates even when damp. Textured synthetic leather palms offer sure grip. Stretch twill on the back of the wrists creates a comfortable fit that seals in warmth.
short_description: The women's REI Recycled Fleece Grip gloves keep your hands warm while you walk the dog, take a hike or head to work in the morning.
